text: Zinc arsenide is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is Zn3As2. It has zinc and arsenide ions. Zinc arsenide is a gray solid. It reacts with acids to make arsine gas. It is toxic like all arsenic compounds. It is made by heating arsenic with zinc. ==Related pages== *Aluminium arsenide *Antimonide Category:Zinc compounds Category:Arsenic compounds
title: Zinc arsenide
